channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump's plans for warship fleet. And, deported Venezuelans must receive due process
item.description: President Trump has announced the Navy will begin building a new fleet of warships. And, a federal judge has ruled the deportations of more than 100 Venezuelan men to El Salvador were illegal.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump has announced the Navy will begin building a new fleet of warships. And, a federal judge has ruled the deportations of more than 100 Venezuelan men to El Salvador were illegal.

(Image credit: Andrew Canallero-Reynolds)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: It's the 'gold standard' in autism care. Why are states reining it in?
item.description: Budget shortfalls and nearly $1 trillion in looming federal Medicaid cuts have prompted states to rein in spending on a widely embraced autism therapy, pinching families who depend on the services.
item.content:encoded:
Budget shortfalls and nearly $1 trillion in looming federal Medicaid cuts have prompted states to rein in spending on a widely embraced autism therapy, pinching families who depend on the services.

(Image credit: Katie Shaw for KFF Health News)
item.dc:creator: Bram Sable-Smith

item.title: U.S. regulators approve Wegovy pill for weight loss
item.description: U.S. regulators on Monday gave the green light to a pill version of the blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy, the first daily oral medication to treat obesity.
item.content:encoded:
U.S. regulators on Monday gave the green light to a pill version of the blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy, the first daily oral medication to treat obesity.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: American journalist injured in Israeli attack wants answers from Washington
item.description: AFP's Dylan Collins was among journalists injured in an Israeli attack on Lebanon in 2023. The attack killed Reuters' Issam Abdallah. Collins was in Washington this month to press for accountability.
item.content:encoded:
AFP's Dylan Collins was among journalists injured in an Israeli attack on Lebanon in 2023. The attack killed Reuters' Issam Abdallah. Collins was in Washington this month to press for accountability.

(Image credit: Hassan Ammar)
item.dc:creator: Frank Langfitt

item.title: Federal student loans are changing. Here's what to expect in 2026
item.description: The SAVE Plan is ending and repayment options will change dramatically in the new year.
item.content:encoded: The SAVE Plan is ending and repayment options will change dramatically in the new year.
item.dc:creator: Cory Turner

item.title: Biden stopped the executions of 37 men. Trump's DOJ wants to punish them
item.description: Since Trump took office, officials have transferred ten of the 37 men Biden spared from execution to the "Alcatraz of the Rockies." One prisoner still awaiting transfer has attempted suicide.
item.content:encoded:
Since Trump took office, officials have transferred ten of the 37 men Biden spared from execution to the "Alcatraz of the Rockies." One prisoner still awaiting transfer has attempted suicide.

(Image credit: Brennan Linsley)
item.dc:creator: Chiara Eisner

item.title: Immigrants now have fewer legal options to stay in the U.S. under Trump
item.description: The 1.6 million number marks the largest-ever effort to strip permissions for immigrants who attempted to migrate to the country through legal means, advocates say.
item.content:encoded:
The 1.6 million number marks the largest-ever effort to strip permissions for immigrants who attempted to migrate to the country through legal means, advocates say.

(Image credit: John Moore)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Can't find the perfect holiday gift? Some people hire personal shoppers to help
item.description: Struggling to find the perfect holiday present? Some gift-givers turn to personal shoppers to take the pressure off of gift giving.
item.content:encoded: Struggling to find the perfect holiday present? Some gift-givers turn to personal shoppers to take the pressure off of gift giving.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: U.S. strikes another alleged drug-smuggling boat in eastern Pacific
item.description: The U.S. military said Monday that it had conducted another strike against a boat it said was smuggling drugs in the eastern Pacific Ocean, killing one person.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. military said Monday that it had conducted another strike against a boat it said was smuggling drugs in the eastern Pacific Ocean, killing one person.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: At least 5 killed after Mexican Navy plane on medical mission crashes in Texas
item.description: A small Mexican Navy plane transporting a young medical patient and seven others crashed Monday near Galveston, killing at least five people and setting off a search in waters along the Texas coast.
item.content:encoded:
A small Mexican Navy plane transporting a young medical patient and seven others crashed Monday near Galveston, killing at least five people and setting off a search in waters along the Texas coast.

(Image credit: Sky Decker Jr.)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
